documentation.title: SocialButton Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: Social network, share on social network, social share, share on facebook, share on twitter, share on linkedin, share on google++
documentation.metadescription: KoolSocialShare is a great control to share your page on different social networks all at once with no hashes. VIEW IT NOW!

property.name: Font
property.shortdesc: Set the font for facebook button.
property.longdesc: Set the font for facebook button.

property.name: Width
property.shortdesc: Set the width for Facebook button.
property.longdesc: Set the width for Facebook button.

property.name: ShowFaces
property.shortdesc: Set whether button show the avatar of people who like your page.
property.longdesc: Set whether button show the avatar of people who like your page.

property.name: SendButton
property.shortdesc: Set whether send button is shown.
property.longdesc: Set whether send button is shown. Default value is true.

property.name: DarkColor
property.shortdesc: Set whether button is in dark mode.
property.longdesc: Set whether button is in dark mode. Default value is false.

property.name: ShowFaces
property.shortdesc: Set the height of the button.
property.longdesc: Set the height of the button.
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$socialshare = new KoolSocialShare("socialshare");

	$button = new SocialButton("StumbleOn");
	$button->Width = "24px";
	$button->Height = "24px";
	$button->ImageSrc = "images/stumbleon.jpg";
	$button->Text = "Share on StumbleOn";
	$button->ToolTip = "Share on StumbleOn";
	
	$socialshare->Add($button);
?>
